channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: S&P 500 and Nasdaq build on records after Canada caves on digital tax — live
Canada rescinds digital services tax after Trump cuts off U.S. trade talks
item.description: The move comes after U.S. President Donald Trump announced over the weekend that he will be "terminating ALL discussions on Trade with Canada"

item.title: Economic calendar: Chicago business barometer kicks off week’s data
S&P 500, Nasdaq head for new records amid confidence over trade, tax bill
Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' clears key Senate hurdle after high drama
item.description: The vote came after hours of uncertainty over whether the massive package could secure enough Republican votes to move to a final Senate vote.

item.title: Senate begins voting on dozens of amendment's to Trump's domestic spending bill
item.description: Lawmakers worked through the weekend to move President Donald Trump's bill closer to the finish line as Republicans' self-imposed July 4 deadline appr...

item.title: UK autos spared under U.S. tariff cut but steel still in question
item.description: Britain was the first country in the world to make a deal with the White House after U.S. President Donald Trump unveiled his reciprocal tariffs plans...

item.title: Stock market has rallied to record highs — but watch for these risks in July
Sen. Thom Tillis says he won't seek re-election after opposing Trump megabill
item.description: Sen. Thom Tillis' announcement is likely to spur a competitive and costly election in the key battleground.

item.title: U.S. stock futures rise after S&P 500’s latest record high
